title: The Heartstone's Truth
goal: They activate or interact with the Heartstone, revealing its true nature and a crucial piece of information about the antagonist.

beats.summary: Kaelen, after much effort, successfully activates the Heartstone, its ancient power thrumming through the hidden chamber.
Instead of a weapon, the Heartstone reveals a profound, unsettling truth: the Shadow Blight is not an external invasion, but a corrupted internal aspect, a twisting of ancient sage magic.
A fragmented vision or whisper from the Heartstone reveals a crucial piece of the Shadow Lord's identity, perhaps a name or a past connection to the Sages.
The revelation leaves the trio shaken, understanding the true, insidious nature of their foe and the depth of the betrayal.
